main event: On September 6, 1967, at approximately 8:00 P.M., a witness observed an unidentified flying object described as a dark, elongated shape hovering above the trees in Cincinnati, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 10 to 15 minutes before it rapidly moved and disappeared from view., The witness was an experienced air traffic controller familiar with various aircraft., The object was reported to be self-illuminating and had a hazy, indistinct outline., Despite the clear weather, no other witnesses could be located for corroboration., The investigation by Project Blue Book classified the case as 'UNIDENTIFIED'.
